body: damn that's a good improvement, hope this gets translated as their other works one day, I would comission it but the only method of payment available in my country to pay in USD around here is in crypto (would pay in stable coins like USDT OR BUSD)  since paypal and others widely available everywhere else are blocked here.

Did Iris Art get drunk? This is amazingly different from his past works. MC actually improved himself and move on. Well, there’s also the other one where the BF collected the evidence of his GF cheating or the one that’s actually a netori with the stepmom but you get my point. Quite a realistic depiction of the scumbag blonde though. He actually bought some milk instead of stayed with her. Girl got ruined though, so a warning for you girls and for you guys with female relatives as well

yeah ! at long last one decent men who didnt jack off to their crush/lover homemade av. it even better when he move on . i love ntr but only for jack off . reading so many of these retard plots really take a toll on my IQ. it go down so fuking hard.

@Destroyer of shitty hentai MC isn't typically smart his depression just fueled his motivation to study so that he can get the hell away from there and work far away. By the last year of college his vigor already cooled down since he moved on but it's too late to flunk since he already has great grades by then.

Some other small things they are childhood friends yes they live next to each other and their families are friends who thought (from what I can guess from the old peoples teasing) that they'd be a good couple.Blonde asked for city tour to get her alone and lied about having no parents and his dream to start his own company and other bs toget pity points from her and made her forget how much of an asshole he was to the mc(he tried to get him fired). She did get pregnant in their 2nd year (most story is y1) and she drops out. The parents I think get in a fight about her being pregnant and he overheard it next day his mom tells him. The blonde guy also ran off and dumped her and he basically says of course he did just look at him or whatever. Comments below tell the rest. I'm assuming the mom also hoped for them to be together from the start cus family/neighborhood friends and that's why she called him so maybe they can be together now. I didn't bother reading the sex scenes lol

the mc loved the girl they both worked at the same place and mc wanted to have relation with her but the blonde intervened nd fucked her nd gave the dvd of them having sex to mc after that the girl told mc they started dating but the blonde was just using her. mc was devastated nd depressed so he started studying seriously so that he could get out of that place. in between the girl nd blonde broke up nd she got pregnant nd mc got good score in university landed a good job.
